Articles.Content: Been having a blast waiting for the next KSP Update. Pretty much the best factory RTS game I have ever played and it just keeps getting better with multiplayer coming out sometime next month.
Heard about it in a different thread once. Checked it out, bought it, and love it. A LOT of bugfixes with the current release.

Heard about it in a different thread once. Checked it out, bought it, and love it. A LOT of bugfixes with the current release.

I use the experimental build and its like the equivalent of the most polished build KSP has ever had. No bashing there just one the devs is crazy at bugs and irons them out really quick. I had like 3 updates in a row just of bug fixes. It's pretty exciting just because I love the idea of watching the progression happen live.

Been looking at a few videos for this on youtube. I'm quite tempted to pick it up now, frankly I would have bought it by now if it was on steam.

Definitely looks like one to watch.

Been looking at a few videos for this on youtube. I'm quite tempted to pick it up now, frankly I would have bought it by now if it was on steam.

Definitely looks like one to watch.

You get a steam key down the road once its on there. I'm 100% sure it will easily land on there.

Just giving this topic a quick bump, as Factorio has indeed hit Steam.

I don't usually buy games as soon as they hit the storepage, but in this case I'm more than happy to make an exception.

11 minutes ago, pxi said:

I don't usually buy games as soon as they hit the storepage, but in this case I'm more than happy to make an exception.

It is a privilege that costs you 33% extra, in this case

Just now, Camacha said:

It is a privilege that costs you 33% extra, in this case

Yep, am aware.

Still more than happy to buy it at it's current price.
